name: Space Runners
description:
Two spaceships, 30 seconds, lots of yellow cubelike meteorites.

Can you make it ?

Space Runners is a simple top down arcade game where you get to control 2 spaceships with less than 30 seconds of fuel left!

The ships can be controlled using the [A] button or the [Left Mouse] click.

Every time you click each spaceship will go to the opposite direction.

Warning : Stay away from the [Space] button. (don't say i didn't warn you)

Music and sound effects by Felix Arifin, you can find more of his awesome stuff here https://soundcloud.com/composerFA

Versions : The game is browser-based using Unity's WebGl. However if you want to play offline, there is a Windows-running version below.
